it.unica.foresee.core.interfaces
Interface Core

public interface Core

Defines the core of the framework, which manages the interaction of all the other components.

Method Summary

Method Detail

makeSnapshot

State makeSnapshot()

Makes a snapshot of the current state.

The State includes the Environment, the Settings, the instruction file and the last executed line from the instruction file.

Returns:
the created state

makeSnapshot

State makeSnapshot(Env e,
                   Settings s,
                   java.io.File instructionsFile,
                   int lastExecutedLine)
Makes a snapshot from the given objects.

Parameters:
e - the environment
s - the settings
instructionsFile - the instruction file
lastExecutedLine - the last line executed from the instructions file
Returns:
the created state
